INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES($ENV{BOOST_INCLUDEDIR})
FIND_PACKAGE (Boost COMPONENTS system thread regex)

SET(CPPS main_client.cpp)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(echo_client ${CPPS})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(echo_client ${Boost_SYSTEM_LIBRARY})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(echo_client ${Boost_THREAD_LIBRARY})

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(
	echo_client
	
	PROPERTIES
  
	RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../bin
)
